mapper.select: select * from (select *, ROW_NUMBER() over(order by product_entered_date) AS rowNum from t_product where member_id=#{member_id}) a where rowNum BETWEEN (#{maxnum}-4) - (#{chapter}-1)*5 and (#{maxnum}) - (#{chapter}-1)*5 order by product_entered_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_product( product_id, member_id, product_sort, product_name, product_main_image, product_price, product_sales_price, product_point, product_program_details, product_price_details, product_facility_details, product_location_details, product_refund_1, product_refund_2, product_state) values( #{product_id}, #{member_id}, #{product_sort}, #{product_name}, #{product_main_image }, #{product_price}, #{product_sales_price}, #{product_point}, #{product_program_details}, #{product_price_details}, #{product_facility_details }, #{product_location_details }, #{product_refund_1 }, #{product_refund_2 }, #{product_state})
insert into t_product_option ( option_id, product_id, product_option_name, product_option_price) values( #{option_id}, #{product_id}, #{product_option_name}, #{product_option_price})
insert into t_product_detail_image (image_id, product_id, fileName, fileType) values(#{image_id}, #{product_id}, #{fileName}, #{fileType})
mapper.update: update t_product set product_sort=#{product_sort}, product_name=#{product_name}, product_main_image=#{product_main_image }, product_price=#{product_price}, product_sales_price=#{product_sales_price}, product_point=#{product_point}, product_program_details=#{product_program_details}, product_price_details=#{product_price_details}, product_facility_details=#{product_facility_details }, product_location_details=#{product_location_details }, product_refund_1=#{product_refund_1 }, product_refund_2=#{product_refund_2 } where product_id = #{product_id}
